summary: An Ordinance amending Section 1 of Ordinance No. 39,457, entitled "An Ordinance relating to street railways and street railway systems, providing for the protection of the property and employees thereof and passengers thereon, and regulating the conduct of persons in respect thereto, and providing penalties for a violation thereof, and declaring an emergency," approved the 12th day of May, 1919, by adding thereto a new subdivision to be known as subdivision (I)
